attributes.action: Stop companies Charging Teens Adult Prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many companies force sixteen and in some cases even fifteen year olds to pay adult prices, how is this justifiable when a sixteen year old cant learn to drive they cannot go out for a drink they cant move out with out permission from there parents they are not given the responsiblity a adult is at 16 and quite correctly so, but why should they be charged as a adult when they truely arnt one the majority of teens if not all dont earn anywhere near as much as a 18 or 21 year old is so why should they pay adult fares
